LogRebalanceFeeAndRevenueCut(address,uin.notice: emitted when rebalancer successfully changes the fee and revenue cut

configPercentDiff().notice: returns how much new config would be different from current config in percent (100 = 1%, 1 = 0.01%).

getDexDynamicFees().notice: returns the dynamic fee for the dex based on the last stored price of the pool

getDexFee().notice: returns the fee for the dex

getDexFeeAndRevenueCut().notice: returns the fee and revenue cut for the dex

getDexRevenueCut().notice: returns the revenue cut for the dex

getDexVariable().notice: returns the last stored prices of the pool and the last interaction time stamp
